io.konik.zugferd.entity.trade

Class Settlement

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.konik.zugferd.entity.trade.Settlement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonSettlement<TradeTax,MonetarySummation>, Serializable

    public class Settlement
extends Object
implements CommonSettlement<TradeTax,MonetarySummation>

    The Trade Settlement

    Contains trade specific payment and price related informations
